name: AyurvedicCure
0:
”Alexa, ask Ayurvedic Cure what is the remedy for indigestion”
”Alexa, ask Ayurvedic Cure tip for weight loss”
”Alexa,ask Ayurvedic Cure to suggest remedies for sour throat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ayurvedic cure
des:
Disclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

Ayurveda teaches us to cherish our innate-nature, with Ayurvedic Cure Alexa will tend to your health problems with the help of some simple organic remedies which can be prepared with in house organics.

Just tell ayurveda about your health problem, and it will suggest you the most suitable health remedies,the skill enables users to toggle among the health remedies flexibly.

User:ask ayurveda what is the remedy for indigestion
Alexa:try 2 tablespoons of aloe vera with a pinch of baking soda for an immediate soothing sensation , there is one more remedy, if you want to know about it say, next

User:feedback please add home remedies for common cold
Alexa:feedback has been taken , thank you , now you may resume your search, to exit from the skill say stop
